results.title: Calcium channel blockers, survival and ischaemic stroke in patients with dementia: a Swedish registry study
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ using @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ had a lower risk of @DISEASE_Cerebral_Infarction @DISEASE_MESH:D002544 @@@ischaemic stroke@@@ compared to other CCB users.

citations.NLM: Kalar I, Xu H, Secnik J, Schwertner E, Kramberger MG, Winblad B, von Euler M, Eriksdotter M, Garcia-Ptacek S. Calcium channel blockers, survival and ischaemic stroke in patients with dementia: a Swedish registry study J Intern Med. 2021 Apr;289(4):508-522. PMID: 32854138

results.title: Calcium channel blockers' contribution to overcoming Current drug discovery challenges in Alzheimer's disease.
results.text_hl: Calcium channel blockers' contribution to overcoming Current drug discovery challenges in @<m>DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@.

results.title: Extrapyramidal side effect of donepezil hydrochloride in an elderly patient
results.text_hl: With the aging of the population, the number of @<m>DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ cases is increasing.

results.title: Loading Amlodipine on Diamond Nanoparticles: A Novel Drug Delivery System
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@Amlodipine@@@ is a @CHEMICAL_1_4_dihydropyridine @CHEMICAL_MESH:C038806 @@@dihydropyridine@@@ calcium channel blocker that cannot pass the blood-brain barrier and might elicit a promising role to reverse @CHEMICAL_Calcium @CHEMICAL_MESH:D002118 @@@calcium@@@-induced @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@excitotoxic neuronal cell death@@@ that underlies many @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ including @<m>DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@ when delivered into the brain.

citations.NLM: Alawdi SH, Eidi H, Safar MM, Abdel-Wahhab MA. Loading Amlodipine on Diamond Nanoparticles: A Novel Drug Delivery System Nanotechnol Sci Appl. 2019;12():47-53. PMID: 32099339
citations.BibTeX: @article{32099339, title={Loading Amlodipine on Diamond Nanoparticles: A Novel Drug Delivery System}, author={Alawdi SH and Eidi H and Safar MM and Abdel-Wahhab MA}, journal={Nanotechnol Sci Appl}, volume={12}, pages={47-53}}

results.title: Effects of telmisartan on cognition and regional cerebral blood flow in hypertensive patients with Alzheimer's disease.
results.text_hl: The @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ group did not show any changes in cognitive function test scores, while the @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ group showed significantly higher scores on the @<m>DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@AD@@@ Assessment Scale-Cognitive Subscale (Japanese version).

citations.NLM: Kume K, Hanyu H, Sakurai H, Takada Y, Onuma T, Iwamoto T. Effects of telmisartan on cognition and regional cerebral blood flow in hypertensive patients with Alzheimer's disease. Geriatr Gerontol Int. 2012 Apr;12(2):207-14. PMID: 21929736
citations.BibTeX: @article{21929736, title={Effects of telmisartan on cognition and regional cerebral blood flow in hypertensive patients with Alzheimer's disease.}, author={Kume K and Hanyu H and Sakurai H and Takada Y and Onuma T and Iwamoto T}, journal={Geriatr Gerontol Int}, volume={12}, number={2}, pages={207-14}}

results.title: [Effects of telmisartan on the level of Abeta1-42, interleukin-1beta, tumor necrosis factor alpha and cognition in hypertensive patients with Alzheimer's disease].
results.text_hl: At 24 weeks, the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ in the @CHEMICAL_Telmisartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000077333 @@@telmisartan@@@ group had better mini-mental state examination (MMSE) (22.0 +- 3.4) and @<m>DISEASE_Alzheimer_Disease</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D000544 @@@Alzheimer's disease@@@ assessment scale-cognitive subscale (ADAS-cog) (15 +- 5) scales scores than those taking @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ (MMSE (19.5 +- 2.8) and ADAS-cog (18 +- 5).

citations.NLM: Li W, Zhang JW, Lu F, Ma MM, Wang JQ, Suo AQ, Bai YY, Liu HQ. [Effects of telmisartan on the level of Abeta1-42, interleukin-1beta, tumor necrosis factor alpha and cognition in hypertensive patients with Alzheimer's disease]. Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi. 2012 Oct 23;92(39):2743-6. PMID: 23290159
citations.BibTeX: @article{23290159, title={[Effects of telmisartan on the level of Abeta1-42, interleukin-1beta, tumor necrosis factor alpha and cognition in hypertensive patients with Alzheimer's disease].}, author={Li W and Zhang JW and Lu F and Ma MM and Wang JQ and Suo AQ and Bai YY and Liu HQ}, journal={Zhonghua Yi Xue Za Zhi}, volume={92}, number={39}, pages={2743-6}}
